name: Food Dehydrator 10 Trays, 800 Watt Stainless Steel Fresh Drying Machine Dehydrated Dryer with Adjustable 190¬∞F Temperature Control/ 24H Timer, for Jerky Herbs Meat Fruit Yogurt
about_this_item: „ÄêLarge Capacity 10 Trays„ÄëMade with 304 food-grade stainless steel. Safe & Durable. Large feet of drying space, with 10-trays, each tray is 12.5*12.5 inch, allow you to dehydrate different types of food simultaneously. All the trays are dishwasher-safe, there‚Äôs no need to worry about potential trouble of using plastic drying trays or become brittle or warped if overheated during washing

„ÄêDigital Touch Setting„ÄëThis fruit dehydrator build-in precise LED digital control panel, digital temperatures preset settings range from 70¬∫ F to 190¬∫ F (20-90‚ÑÉ), with a countdown timer up to 24 hours, provides accurate drying times and temperatures to make it super easy for you to start creating delicious dried fruit, jerky, herbs, meat or yogurt! The internal light works to light up the drying area

„ÄêEasy to use Digital Display„ÄëThe touch menu on front of the unit is easy to use and remembers previous settings, it keeps the last time and heat for turn on, so it is a one-touch to start another batch. Don‚Äôt have to reset the machine again

„ÄêQuiet & Safe Operation„ÄëWith noise levels 45dB to 50 dB, our dehydrator for food and jerky won‚Äôt add unwanted noise to your kitchen, or disturb you if you‚Äôre dehydrating food overnight. Equipped with automatic shutoff and overheat protection. Bonus silicone gloves are supplied to open the food dehydrator to prevent burns

„ÄêSatisfaction Service„ÄëComes with abundant accessories:10 stainless steel drying trays, 10 non-stick silicone sheets, 2 Fruit Roll Sheet, 1 drip tray, a pair of silicone gloves, 2 storage containers, 1 user manual and 1 recipe book. If there any problem within 3 year, send message to our customer service freely , we will offer you a best solution

title: Nice efficient dehydrator
content: This small unit has a higher heat range than many competitive products. It may look small but it can dehydrate 2 lbs of blueberries in one batch. That is all I need. It is a workhorse for its size. I bought a competitive larger product from a different vendor and returned it for this one. That was a great decision.  This unit  is able to do the same amount of blueberries more efficiently than the the larger competitive unit. The fan in this unit is twice as efficient as the other unit. It because of its size is less expensive to run (less space to disperse the heat). The controls are much easier to use and more intuitive. This vendor offers a larger 6 shelf unit but the view oval window is smaller than the square viewglass on this unit. And the other units controls are not as nice and easy to use as this one. i recommend purchasing this unit.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022

title: Verified Purchase
content: I Love this little machine. the only thing the top of unit has a couple deep scratches. I was going to send it back. But I decided to see if it worked . It does work well. I made beef jerky 190 degrees for about 2 hours. Very thin lean beef. . Tasted awesome. I wish  it had more detail recipes. I guess with this one. Turn out delicious üòãI decided to keep it with the scratches. Also I thought the two containers were supposed to be glass . They were cheap looking plastic. Not even sure if it's bpa free. Probably not because it would have said.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023

title: Fantastic!
content: Was smaller than what I thought it would be. I had an Excalibur and it just wore out. This one doesn't dry as well as the excaliber. Because of the fan.  I think a fan in back would be better. I dehydrate a lot for my pantry and after using for awhile it is ok. The companY got back with me pretty quick on my review and offered a 50.00 credit  for this which I thought was very nice.  I think I will probably exchange it for the bigger one. One plus is that it is very quiet and would be very  good for the occasional dehydrating. During garden season, I use mine every day.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023

title: Best I've ever owned
content: I purchased this to make dog treats out of sweet potatoes and have ended up dehydrating all kinds of fruits.  The dehydrator itself is compact and can be stored away easily.  This is awesome for those of us that have small counter space.  I love this dehydrator it's super easy to use and the bananas I did turned out delicious.  Oh and the dogs absolutely love the sweet potatoes.

title: Verified Purchase
content: This has been a lifesaver for a busy parent like me! I use it mainly for drying snacks and ingredients, and it's a real champ. The instructions make it a breeze to preserve a variety of foods, but I love the flexibility to tweak drying times to suit my family's tastes. It's compact, which means it can hang out on my counter and then magically disappear into my kitchen cabinet. While it would've been awesome if it came with more containers (because we always need more!), I easily found extras online. Recommend!!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023

title: Must have for parents
content: I have a wonderful, very expensive, BIG dehydrator that I love. But it is cumbersome and has to be stored when not in use for large amounts of food. This little Septree dehydrator is small enough that I can keep it out all of the time. It works a charm! I use it mainly for dehydrating small amounts of herbs and vegetables. It works quietly and efficiently. I am very pleased that I can adjust the temperature low enough to preserve the color in my herbs. It even came with two silicon screens. Very handy. I am very pleased with this purchase. PROS: four stainless steel shelves with adequate space between their placement, easy to clean stainless steel interior, very quiet, adjustable temperature and timer, actually works efficiently! I can say that I recommend this little dehydrator.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: This item works great. It was my first dehydrator ever so I wasn't sure what to expect.  It's smaller than I thought. I can do small amounts at a time.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
